ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Configurable Progress bars, they may include percentage, elapsed time, and/or the estimated completion time. They work in terminals, in 'Emacs' 'ESS', 'RStudio', 'Windows' 'Rgui' and the 'macOS' 'R.app'. The package also provides a 'C++' 'API', that works with or without 'Rcpp'.

Configurable Progress bars, they may include percentage, elapsed time, and/or the estimated completion time. They work in terminals, in 'Emacs' 'ESS', 'RStudio', 'Windows' 'Rgui' and the 'macOS' 'R.app'. The package also provides a 'C++' 'API', that works with or without 'Rcpp'.

name: r-progress
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-progress
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/progress_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/progress/progress_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ea2b079b894de85c3ab12088c9c52aec06432245047a961d5b4b8aa6889f9276

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-crayon
    - r-hms
    - r-prettyunits
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-crayon
    - r-hms
    - r-prettyunits

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('progress')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('progress')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/r-lib/progress#readme
  license: MIT
  summary: Configurable Progress bars, they may include percentage, elapsed time, and/or the estimated completion time. They work in terminals, in 'Emacs' 'ESS', 'RStudio', 'Windows' 'Rgui' and the 'macOS' 'R.app'. The package also provides a 'C++' 'API', that works with or without 'Rcpp'.
  license_family: MIT

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: progress
# Title: Terminal Progress Bars
# Version: 1.2.2
# Author: Gabor Csardi [aut, cre], Rich FitzJohn [aut]
# Maintainer: Gabor Csardi <csardi.gabor@gmail.com>
# Description: Configurable Progress bars, they may include percentage, elapsed time, and/or the estimated completion time. They work in terminals, in 'Emacs' 'ESS', 'RStudio', 'Windows' 'Rgui' and the 'macOS' 'R.app'. The package also provides a 'C++' 'API', that works with or without 'Rcpp'.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# LazyData: true
# URL: https://github.com/r-lib/progress#readme
# BugReports: https://github.com/r-lib/progress/issues
# Imports: hms, prettyunits, R6, crayon
# Suggests: Rcpp, testthat, withr
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-15 20:28:47 UTC; gaborcsardi
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-16 21:30:03 UTC
